last_episode_to_air.name: Holy Laws
last_episode_to_air.overview: Morgan Freeman explores what holy laws mean for different religions and the punishments awaiting those who disobey; he investigates how the eruption of Vesuvius was seen as divine retribution; he sees the oldest existing copy of the Ten Commandments.

name: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
original_name: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
overview: Morgan Freeman presents his quest in order to find how most religions perceive life after death, what different civilizations thought about the act of creation and other big questions that mankind has continuously asked.

episodes.name: Beyond Death
episodes.overview: In the event series premiere, host Morgan Freeman explores how different religions of past and present answer the question: What happens when we die?

episodes.name: Apocalypse
episodes.overview: Host Morgan Freeman examines both the past and the future to determine what various faith traditions predict about the End of Days.

episodes.name: Who Is God?
episodes.overview: Who is God? Morgan begins a quest to discover who God is — and how he, she or they have evolved over human history.

episodes.name: Creation
episodes.overview: Morgan Freeman traverses the globe to ask: Where did we come from? What happened “in the beginning”?

episodes.name: Why Does Evil Exist?
episodes.overview: Where does evil come from? Morgan sets out to understand the root of evil and how our ideas of it have evolved over the millennia.

episodes.name: The Power of Miracles
episodes.overview: Morgan seeks to discover how our belief in miracles can shape our understanding of God.

episodes.name: The Chosen One
episodes.overview: In the Season 2 premiere, those believed to be chosen to lead their believers are examined.

episodes.name: Heaven and Hell
episodes.overview: The concepts of heaven and hell are explored.

episodes.name: Proof of God
episodes.overview: A study of whether God still makes his presence known in modern times.

episodes.name: Search for the Devil
episodes.overview: Morgan Freeman explores the role that the devil plays in various religions.

episodes.name: Gods Among Us
episodes.overview: Morgan Freeman goes on a journey to find proof of a higher power.

episodes.name: Visions of God
episodes.overview: Morgan Freeman explores the mysteries of divine visions; he meets a woman who believes she was cured of paralysis by miraculous waters and an Anishnaabe man who endured days alone in the wilderness for the sake of divine vision.

episodes.name: Deadly Sins
episodes.overview: Morgan Freeman explores how religions have developed ways to fight back against sin.

episodes.name: Divine Secrets
episodes.overview: Morgan Freeman sets out to uncover why secrecy and religion are often intertwined.

episodes.name: Holy Laws
episodes.overview: Morgan Freeman explores what holy laws mean for different religions and the punishments awaiting those who disobey; he investigates how the eruption of Vesuvius was seen as divine retribution; he sees the oldest existing copy of the Ten Commandments.
